attributes.action:
British people voted to leave the EU .
 its time Parliament listened
attributes.background: The British people voted to leave the EU . Parliament has to stop thinking what they want . and put the Peoples choice first in a legal Democratic  vote . please sign the petition Parliament must hear our voices

rejection.details:
We understand you would like the UK to leave the EU, but we aren't sure exactly what action you would like Parliament to take to make that happen. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387 (to not revoke Article 50)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185 (to leave without a deal)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233104 (to support the Prime Minister's withdrawal agreement)
